website_summaries.verdict: While it has some nice design qualities, other models on our list are either more affordable or have a larger cooking capacity.
pros: Even heating, clear digital temperature touch pad, and reasonable price
Oblong tier design makes it easy to store
cons: Cooking capacity is on the small side, and there have been some reports of "lemons

customer_reviews.title: Do not Purchase this steamer!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first we liked how light the steamer was and it has worked well until the last two times.....unfortunately it was total full of water all through the steamer and we have never submersed it, it was also sitting in a pool of water, cannot figure out how this happened, but feel we may have been electricuted had we not unplugged it. Unless you purchased extra protection the warranty states they will repair or replace at your expense to ship....it has gone to the garbage pit and my rice cooker steams. I do not recommend. Purchased 12/26/17 died 4/9/2018
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hearron

customer_reviews.title: Growing Mold in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The center piece of the bottom part (where you fill in water) can get very moldy. I washed it and dried it with table cloth every time i used it. I used it less than 10 times. When i noticed some white dots, I thought it is nothing and keep using it. Until it grows full mold, only i knew I've been steaming my food with mold in it. So disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice steamer, not dishwasher friendly
customer_reviews.text: The steamer is good quality. It holds a decent amount of food, cooks well, and doesn't make a mess all over the place like others I've tried. the bottom piece of the steaming trays does detach, although its really not that big of a problem putting it back on (although can be mildly annoying). i do wish those parts were dishwasher safe as I use it a lot and often cook items such as fish. I recommend it, just be prepared to do a lot of hand washing to keep it clean
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of usage there was a smell coming from the unit... I opened it up and I saw that there is no seal by the controls and no seal around the lip preventing mosture from getting into the area where the electronics are... it would only be a matter of time before the circuit board got wet and started shorting out.... I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: sternzy

customer_reviews.title: Works well, convenient features.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, the bowls are somewhat flimsy feeling and the bottoms being removable are too easily dislodged. That said, this is a nice little steamer that cooks my veggies perfectly. The keep warm function is very convenient and so is the little pull out drawer you can add water with. The whole unit is lightweight and easy to store. One star off for the fiddly bowls but overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this steamer!!!! If you are considering buying this I’d highly suggest you did!!! Love love love it. It cooks my asparagus perfectly along with everything else 😍 *****edit Changed from 5 stars to 1.... That was my first review for the first week I had it. Bought February 3, 2018 and today March 23,2018 and it has stopped working!!! We turn it on and it turns right back off after a couple minutes. So disappointed 😢 something is seriously wrong with the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Contreras Family

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great steamer
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a steamer for sometime as have had this for a few months and really enjoy the benefits nutrition wise of steamed foods. Cleaning is not too bad if you let is soak in soapy water for a few your cleaning will be easier. I need to try steaming rice on top and rest of food at the bottom compartments so that seasonings won't get into my rice, just a thought. Maybe finding a good steamer recipe book would do as well. Haven't tried eggs in it but fish is great. Alll in all I do enjoy the steamer and glad I purchased it here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Moldy, Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: After the first use, mold had grown. I left it to dry on the dry rack and found the next day that it had already grown mold! I used it a few times after that thinking that it couldn't have been mold but the situation just seemed to get worse. I tried cleaning it many many times to no avail. This is a health hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Broke after second use
customer_reviews.text: Third use, turned on, on it's own started increasing cook time to one hour. Turned down by pressing button to decrease time it kept going to 1 minute won't go up. Unplugged and tried again now won't turn on. First use noticed water under it, assumed I spilled, second use made sure counter was dry and I didn't spill still found water under it.
customer_reviews.author: Brew

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: Bought this steamer since the one we had for many years, an Oster, finally died on us and has been discontinued. Very disappointed when it arrived. It was a lot smaller than I imagined it would be. The plastic is VERY flimsy and cheap. The bottoms of the trays don't even stay, they just sit in the tray and fall out easily. We use our steamer several times a week for fresh steamed vegetable. Used it once and we are already searching for another one to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: 2 yrs old....
customer_reviews.text: Got this 2 yrs ago, its still going strong. I love it, we steam veggies and make rice, and cook hotdogs in it. If your careful it will last a long time. I wash it and dry it right away after dinner. So far in 2 yrs no clouding. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice  steamer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older model that finally quit working. The dual baskets work well. In the old steamer, we used to have to add those ingredients that required less cooking time later. With this unit we just put those ingredients in the upper basket where the food doesn't cook quite as fast. The steamer also has a delay timer that comes in handy when you want to get everything ready but need to delay cooking for 30 minutes or more. Because the bottoms of each basket are removable, the steamer can be used as a single basket steamer if desired as well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Y

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of details in the manual. Have to experiment with it.
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to use! And filling the water reservoir is so easy with the water door. It works great! Made 14 hard boiled eggs using both baskets timed it for 40 minutes & they turned out perfect & so easy to peel! Peeled white pot. cut in half & stacked them by taking out bottom of 2 nd basket & steamed for 60 minutes. Turner out great!You do have to mash them while are not to turn out right! Really like this machine! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: V.K. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Set a Second Tomer though
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. The first one is still working. We gave it to our daughter when she moved out. We like the double height for artichokes. Perfect hard boiled eggs are easy with this steamer. We have learned to set a second timer though. When the cycle finishes the steamer sounds a chime and goes to warm mode. That will keep the food cooking and that isn’t too good of a thing for some foods like rice and eggs. The volume on the chimer is very low. No problem though, we just set a second timer so we know to shut it off.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Breakingafter 2yrs of use
customer_reviews.text: Cons: 1. The plastic over the buttons has deteriorated and is cracking after 1 yr of use. 2. After 2 yrs of use, it keeps turning off after a couple of minutes and giving a “low water” warning even though the water is filled to the max line. 3. It has a warming “feature” that as far as I can tell, can’t be turned off. So, your food will continue to cook on a low steam for an hour after you’ve cooked it unless if you turn the power off.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly604

customer_reviews.title: was great for a year
customer_reviews.text: was great for a year...now the time always go to an hour. count down is not accurate...piece of junk as far as I am concerned. And yes, I checked our outlets etc. (via an Electrician) all other appliances work fine. looking for a replacement now.
customer_reviews.author: R. Embrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice steamer with delay start feature.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit. I used it twice the first day it arrived. The manual is brief but adequate. I love the delay start feature and the automatic setting to 20 minutes of steam when it's turned on. I do wish that the signal at end of cycle were louder, though, and that somehow the baskets would nest for storage. Nesting would be handy but then I don't know how you'd make them stack for steaming. That's for an engineer - not me. Anyway - nice unit. The bottoms of both baskets remove so be very careful when you lift them off the unit.
customer_reviews.author: aputerlady

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Update to 2 stars. In less than 9 months the bottom of the water tank wear abnormally bad. I use only purified water in the steamer and it lasts 8 months? See my pic. Used a while now and I like it so far. I'll always set timer so it brings water to boil when i wake up in the morning, then anything going into the steamer will be ready in less time and come out perfectly,, not too soft but well cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Cecile

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of nearly forty dollars. It worked two times. Now it constantly says low water when it has plenty of water and will not steam. It was to late to send it back so will just throw it away. I found that I am not the only person to have this happen Do not buy this product. Have reached out to the company via phone and emai to no avail I doubt amazon will do anything either. Should have read the reviews. A funny thing, no reviews mentioned this until I searched under low water. There were many complaints about this
customer_reviews.author: Derry Deane Kramer

customer_reviews.title: that's annoying fishing the bottom out of the bowl
customer_reviews.text: I wanted compact and it is. I was eager for a digital display but it's impossible to read unless you are at eye level. There's a silly tiny drawer that comes out for "extra" water if you have a tea set for barbie. I just fill it up then put the tray in. There are two plastic trays that the bottom comes out when you tip it to remove your veggies, say i want to dump my green beans into a bowel to add butter, that's annoying fishing the bottom out of the bowl. Plus they feel flimsy. Removing large pieces of steamed veggies are fine, corn. But not small pieces. It works fine though and steams well.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Coletti

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use it all the time. Only 2 worries I have with the machine. Is the beeping when it's done. Is very low. I never hear it. So I have to make sure to set a second timer. The bottoms in each tray is removable, which is awesome and helpful. But at times they move out of place and all my food drops out. Or food gets stuck. I use it all the time though for eggs /veggies. Steams great and I havent had to worry about the water level. Havent cooked anything past 25 mins. Fits perfect in cabinet when not using
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: HATE IT!!!!!!!  TOO MANY PARTS CAN NOT RATE ZERO STARS!
customer_reviews.text: I had an oster steamer that was only 3 parts, I loved it. I always did peppers and onions with polish sausage. It only took 15 minutes and the sausage would be bursting open. I used this one right out of the box after washing and I cooked them for 25 minutes and still sausages were not bursting. I then had 5 parts to wash. You can not dump remaining food without the bottom falling out. I HATE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, But Is Showing Its Age
customer_reviews.text: It works well at a good price. Our biggest concern is the quality of materials/longevity. The clear plastic components are beginning to get cloudy and show small cracks with daily use over 10 months. The pushbutton switches (especially the "UP" switch) is about to break through the membrane plastic. The water capacity seems a bit too small, and we sometimes have to refill through the add-water port to finish steaming a meal. I wish the food steamer manufacturers would ditch the clear plastic food baskets and upgrade to Pyrex glass.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: leaks and has horrible smell from inside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer in April 2018, It steams well, but it keeps getting water inside the sealed base and I have never submerged it in water. It has now gotten such a foul order coming out of the base that I had to throw it into the garbage. It appears I’m not the only person experiencing this issue. There is some internal design flaw. I wouldn’t buy one unless they find and fix this flaw! Definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: It shuts off own its own 30 seconds after turned on.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item a couple of years ago, it gets the job done when it works. However, since the day one I got it, it would just shut off on its own less than 1 min after I turned it on. I checked water, checked the set up. Everything is correct. I just had to go back to turn it on again and again until it stopped shutting down on its own. And I was never able to use any other function button. A slight touch will make the unit shut down again. The problem has gotten worse and worse. I am tired of this now and will purchase other brand.
customer_reviews.author: inclover

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last, 90 days and dead
customer_reviews.text: I loved it till it died, it lasted 90 days and then the interface went blank and I could not even turn it on. Since I can't get it replaced without cost, the least I can do is leave a poor review. Minor problems also in that cracks in the lid near the handle showed up almost immediately but since I could still use it, I didn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Klein

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Digital Food Steamer is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love my new steamer. It is set automatic on 20 minutes, so for some vegetables I back it off to 15 minutes. I also unplug it when I am done. It washes easily by removing the bowl and the black under tray that is filled with collection from the steam. Then wash and use the black tray to refill the water.
customer_reviews.author: H. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach 37530A Digital Food Steamer, 5.5 Quart
customer_reviews.text: My old one finally started to leak after 15 years, so my husband bought me the Hamilton Beach 37530A Digital Food Steamer, 5.5 Quart, and it is so easy to use. What is nice you can remove the top container and have a very large space to cook Sprouts, and Corn on the Cob with out cutting the corn in half. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bickers

customer_reviews.title: one of the greatest uses I have found for this - is steaming ...
customer_reviews.text: one of the greatest uses I have found for this - is steaming a dozen eggs at once (I put 6 per tray). They are perfect every time and I dont have to watch them. Just fill water, insert eggs, push button and come back 20 minutes later. Everything else I have cooked in this has been great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Lakey

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it isn't trapping water or mold.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well initially, but I discovered a few weeks in that there was an odor coming from the water container. It had been trapping water and food in cracks even after I dumped it and scrubbed it after each use. There was mold in there so I immediately threw it away because it scared me to think I was eating that in my food.
customer_reviews.author: amy Dwain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent steamer to have!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I did on Amazon. Great product! I have to eat steamed food for a while due to my medical condition. I had to steam the old traditional way and it would take forever and extra efforts to cook something. With this digital steamer, you just add your food according to the times (see the instruction book that comes with the product) for each food item and you will be surprised how good the food is cooked. Thank you Hamilton Beach!
customer_reviews.author: YBJ

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This little steamer is great. We've used it several times since it arrived and it is super easy to use, and cooks veggies quickly. I do wish that the cooking "baskets" (not sure what else to call them" were solid pieces. The bottoms come out, presumably for easy cleaning, but to me that makes it more of a hassle. Still, I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS PIECE OF JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I am truly amazed that Hamilton Beach would place their name on such a singularly inferior product. It is constructed entirely out of very flimsy, cheap plastic. I have attempted to contact the company, in order to secure a refund, and return this worthless piece of junk! So far, no response. I WILL NEVER PURCHASE ANOTHER HAMILTON BEACH PRODUCT, AND STRONGLY ADVISE ALL OTHERS TO DO LIKEWISE!
customer_reviews.author: James J. Eby

customer_reviews.title: Steam steam steam
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this product, my wife came up with high colesterol. I started steaming her food , vegetables, salmon . Chicken . She lost 15 pounds , which made her feel better and her colesterol is back down . Great product well made , easy to clean . And happy wife
customer_reviews.author: DJ flex

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Product with Safety Issue
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I write on Amazon and let me make it short and clear: do not buy this product. I bought it on Dec 24, 2018 and it broke down on Jan 30, 2019. Just before I plug in the power today, I found that the water tank started leaking water into the electrical part of the machine. And I could not imagine what will happen if the leakage happens when the power is on. It is a bad quality product with serious safety problems.
customer_reviews.author: ZZeng

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this steamer for the first time today. I steamed an onion, carrot and some frozen brussel sprouts. Everything cooked perfectly using the 20 min. setting. All the veggies retained good flavor. I like the convenient size of the steamer. So far I am very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this steamer at all. Broke second time using. Water leaking everywhere also the digital panel quit working after second use. Sent item back.
customer_reviews.author: cyp

customer_reviews.title: too much work
customer_reviews.text: too much to clean, have used it for several months and stopped and went back to vegging in the skillet. the bottom part never look clean enuf, even after being in dishwasher ; too many parts; and the timer is not quiet right;; its ok; I will use again one day but it takes as long as a skillet and the skillet veggies taste better.
customer_reviews.author: franb-zgorski

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this steamer a lot. I mainly use it to steam vegetables in it. I have been buying this brand for a long time and it does a good job. I highly recommend this steamer! Happy with my purchase! Thankyou so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina G

customer_reviews.title: Second rate steamer
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent multilevel steamer. Eggs were set for 13-14min (could figure out a time) that were either runny or chalky, not a goal consistency. Alarm is too quite. Poorly powered steamer, depending on water level it provided variable steam rate and strength. We used this for eggs, meal prep and veggies with meals. Previous multilevel steamer was simpler, with only a dial, but regardless of water level it delivered consistent steam. It was predictable.
customer_reviews.author: Tater.tot

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing! Leaked after using twice.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this steam after our Oster brand steamer broke from many years use. After using it twice, water started leaking from the bottom of the unit. Not just a little bit, a whole puddle of water. This has consistently been a problem, I have to keep a towel under the unit when steaming rice or vegetables and I worry that it will damage our countertops. My husband and I have each reached out to HB customer service when we first encountered the problem but he never heard anything back. I really wanted to like this steamer, but after our experience I'd say you're better off not purchasing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J.

customer_reviews.title: Easiest flavorful cooking ever!
customer_reviews.text: I made tilapia, “baked” potatoes, and Brussels sprouts....oh my! The FLAVOR was simply amazing. My husband is diabetic and he loved the flavor of the food. We highly recommend this steamer. It’s a joy to use and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia c

customer_reviews.title: I first bought the Hamilton Beach Digital Steamer back in 2013 and was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disapponted with this steamer. I first bought the Hamilton Beach Digital Steamer back in 2013 and was very happy with it. When it died in 2017. I bought this model but it is flawed. The water reservoir does not hol more than 15 min after being fully loaded. This means that we need to recharge water 2/3 time to cook properly rice or veggie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed...replace a Black&Decker steamer with only 2 parts (heater & basket). This one has 3 parts and is very awkward, difficult to clean, and impossible to dry without collecting poo;s of water. The steaming basket is not flat; and it is difficult to remove the steamed vegetables. Do not recommend...d
customer_reviews.author: dagneytaggart

customer_reviews.title: I do weekly food prep and this was awesome to use last night for the first time
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Why have I not bought a steamer until now! I do weekly food prep and this was awesome to use last night for the first time! I steamed a pound of broccoli and a pound of green beans in less than 20 minutes, my whole week's worth of food! And it tasted great! I cant wait to use this for everything else!
customer_reviews.author: Missy T

customer_reviews.title: irritating steamer
customer_reviews.text: Too small and bottom of baskets keep falling out. I don't why they made the bottom of the steamer baskets removable. I tried glueing them but that didn't work. Look for a better steamer!
customer_reviews.author: G. Luker

customer_reviews.title: Now this is the best item I have bought in a really long time
customer_reviews.text: Now this is the best item I have bought in a really long time. It gets used almost every day! So easy to use and it makes such wonderful steamed vegetables. I would recommend anyone who needs to cut the fats in their diet use this. My husband and I are diabetic and steaming is so easy. We even make hard boiled eggs and corn on cobb in it. The price is incredible and so affordable. Slim line makes it easy to store on the counter. It gets a 10 for service, durability and ease in using!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cannot put food on a ceramic dish to steam
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is very shallow and small, I like to put the food on a dish to steam and nothing fits at all unless it's a very very small dish. Wish they still carry the Gourmia steamer, mine died after a power surge.
customer_reviews.author: arale

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke within 2 weeks of purchase
customer_reviews.text: While we really like the ease of steaming vegetables and the versatility of this steamer, the handle on the top broke off within the first two weeks of using our new steamer. The Hamilton Beach website shows no replacement tops available; out of stock. I am just wondering if the tops are out of stock because the breaking off of the handle is a frequent occurance. I have seen a few other reviews where the reviewer also mentioned that the handle broke off in the same way ours did. Other than the broken handle we really enjoy the steamer. It was a good value and is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Posey

customer_reviews.title: One versatile appliance to make life simple...
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is so easy to use and with two compartments you can multitask. Everything from chicken to vegetables it all comes out perfect. And speaking of perfect, the rice bowl is the easiest and tastiest rice ever in just 35 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kizere

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I loved my rice steamer but it quit so I decided to buy something that would give me more versatility. This one does the trick. Allows me to steam a couple different items at the same time. I'm still figuring out what the best timing is for certain veggys and meat but that's not the fault of the steamer. I like my stuff steamed a little longer than most people. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smothers

customer_reviews.title: 2 Steam or not2 steam
customer_reviews.text: This is handy in a pinch. It takes 20 minutes to have nice protein and veggies. I like to brown the protein after steaming. Steak is not tender in steamer. However, poultry and fish come out tasty. I use three times a week at least. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! It’s like a little oven but steamer. Veggies come out so crisp and tasty. I have made chicken also which doesn’t take long at all. Definitely a healthier way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast. Tastes, easy to clean and helps to eat a clean diet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have ever put in my kitchen besides my vitamin. I use it twice a day , every day. I bought eight of these as x mad gifts for friends and they all live them as much as I do. Easy clean up . Amazing taste. And GREAT for eating clean. Cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: yolande fox

customer_reviews.title: All around great product that easy to use, easy to clean and does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, very easy to use and easy to clean. Easy to use settings and easy to add additional water while its in use. Used so far for steaming potatoes russet and sweet, various veggies and even hotdogs and buns. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: E. Willy

customer_reviews.title: Get healthy
customer_reviews.text: We use this at work and its amazing. It cooks meals in 20 or less minutes and it tastes so good. Better than boiling because the steamer keeps all the nutrients in the food. We have done everything including pork chops. You wont be disappointed. Its a hard clean though, wrap your food in foul to decrease cleaning time
customer_reviews.author: Deandra

customer_reviews.title: Buttons deteriorate. Starts to smell.
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these and I don't really like them in the long run. The button covers come apart and then it is awkward to press. Also, the little knobs on the container that holds the plate in place can break off. Also, mine smells bad and I tried to clean it but now the electronics are messed up and it won't work. Getting a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Rehberg/Meat For Maturity

customer_reviews.title: The only appliance sitting on my counter anymore
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost daily to cook rice and veggies for myself and my 2 small children. Might need something bigger to feed more than 2 adults if you're steaming rice in the lower level. Easy to use, easy to clean, seems like it will last a while. Got rid of the microwave, no looking back...
customer_reviews.author: S. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Directions take with a grain of salt - product excellent
customer_reviews.text: I needed a steamer with the rice vessel, which I discovered was harder to find than last I purchased. Excellent for rice and veggies.....not at all happy with doing boiled eggs....it actually takes about twice as long as the booklet states for boiled eggs, but that is an issue with the directions, not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it started leaking water
customer_reviews.text: I loved this food steamer and used it 2 times a week. Owned it for 18 months and it started leaking water when you fill the water reservoir. The water flows out of the back vertical seam. Unable to use. Unfortunately the warranty is only 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie A Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great food steamer
customer_reviews.text: This food steamer works great! I steamed my salmon, broccoli , and red potatoes. The Salmon came out perfect! The potatoes and broccoli was like eating from a top steak house. I'm so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Its Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be glass. The slightest impact while trying to wash it and you worry about its going to crack. If I hadn't been so busy I would have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: GeoTagger

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to replace another unit. Have steamed several varieties of vegetables, rice, and fish. Everything turned out great. I recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Carol and William

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I’ve cooked so many veggies & meats in it! I put frozen chicken on for an hour and it just shreds. It’s my new favorite thing in the kitchen and I highly recommend to those who loves steamed food.
customer_reviews.author: Tdanielle

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Steamer. It heats up and cooks fast. Glad I got it. I also like the fact that I can steam more then one thing at a time. Couldn't do that with my old steamer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Hamilton Beach steamer, I started using it the first day it arrived. I can have a fast meal in about 10 to 15 minutes. Some people said it was troublesome to clean up, but for me it was not true, cleanup was fast and easy. I have made salmon and tilapia, green beans, zucchini and yellow squash alone with sweet potatoes, you name it this steamer can cook it in minutes. If you are looking for a new steamer try this one, I glad I did...
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: but wasn't happy with the reviews on them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer because I generally only steam 4-8 servings of vegetables at a time. I researched many other models, but wasn't happy with the reviews on them. Finally, I found the Hamilton Beach Digital Food Steamer! I love the size; perfect for the counter top! When you want smaller-batch steaming, this unit is perfect. It's easy to use, clean, and store. I would definitely recommend this unit to anyone looking for a smaller steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your time buying this unit
customer_reviews.text: Wow... Based upon alot of reviews I bought this and used it twice and sent it back. While it did ok with veggies. It took almost an hour to cook 1 cup of rice and then was mush. With the digital timer. I followed to instructions exactly but when it goes to warm, you are forced to turn the unit off in order to add more time.... frustrating. Also the timer is very hard to read. I had to bend over and stand back about two feet in order to read the timer. Trust me.... don't waste your time buying this unit. I had a sunbeam for 20 years.... doesn't compare.... wish I could buy another sunbeam.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: recommended.
customer_reviews.text: have been using it daily to steam eggs, corn, rice, etc. it is smaller than what i had expected but performance is great. the only complain i have is the removable trays, not sure why the bottom one is also removable. if it is fixed then it would be much faster to clean and put back together.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is really spacious and fits alot! I use it to steam vegetables and dim sum! Our previous steamer died after a year of use and I'm hoping this steamer will outlast that. If you like to steam, this is definitely the steamer to use. It's easy to clean with the bottoms of the steamers being removable - the only qualm i have is that it's a little hard to clean the grooves meant for eggs - gotta make sure you wash those out thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am crazy about this steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say anything negative about this appliance, except that I wish I had it 20 years ago!😊 I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Smells mildewy
customer_reviews.text: We use our steamer almost every day. After only a few weeks, even after drying fully, this one smelled mildewy and affects the flavor of the food. Had to replace it with another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: J Crista

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, easy, you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, clean, and store. Love it. And I'm not much of a cook. I easily prepare veggies/meals for my family of 5. Takes 20 min for most things. Really keeps the food's flavor without over or under cooking.
customer_reviews.author: W Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased several of these steamers over the last 25 years and have been very satisfied. Not with this one! Used it perhaps 6-10 times and the main body cracked and leaked water. The timer display steamed up and the steamer stopped working. Very disappointing since we were glad to find it. Can't return since box was thrown out. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Pam O.

customer_reviews.title: Potential for Leaking
customer_reviews.text: This is the second model I have owned. The first one I owned for 6 years and the bottom started to leak water. I ordered the second one from amazon and I have used it maybe a dozen times and the bottom leaks! My first one was great quality but this one is clearly a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was good for a little over a year
customer_reviews.text: Actually, liked this steamer, however, at 15 months it died. Manual claims warranty for 5 years in Canada, 1 year in US. Soooo, I'm going to try the Classic Cuisine Steamer...wish me luck
customer_reviews.author: CJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: It came without a booklet of instructions. I have no idea how to use this, or how log to cook anything. I'm so mad what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Momma

customer_reviews.title: What a great food steamer, makes food tasty and tender
customer_reviews.text: Just love our steamer for vegetables, potatoes, turnips, brocolli, cabbage, etc. It make the food taste so good and the steamer is so easy to use and clean up. You will love this steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this steamer to EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this steamer!! It is my absolute favorite! I steam all my vegetables in it and even our proteins. I thought I broke it because I got water in the base.. I let it dry out for a couple days and it was good as new!! I would have definitely replaced it! Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Ashley George

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Only problem was that I had one of the trays close to the steamer when it was on, it melted the plastic on that extra steam tray. My fault actually, if you put the baskets/plastic in the dishwasher, be sure to use top rack. Very nice product. Excellent service and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Although I liked how it worked
customer_reviews.text: I returned the Oster steamer for a refund from the company. Although I liked how it worked, it has no knob on the cover to remove it and caused me a first degree burn on the inside of my wrist to elbow. I chose the Hamilton Beach steamer for cover and removable bottoms that allow items to stand up while cooking. I also like that both bottoms offer more eggs for steaming
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Mayron

customer_reviews.title: compact steamer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice intermediate size steamer, with two steaming baskets. I live alone and this steamer is just the right size for up to four people; and it also fits together compactly for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Simken

customer_reviews.title: Loved while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVED this appliance. Used it at least twice a week. Steamed vegetables are a staple in my house. Owned this one for 4 months and it just blew up tonight. Had corn on the cob in it. Heard a loud pop, looked on the counter and it had died. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla baker

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer I have owned yet!
customer_reviews.text: The baskets and design of this steamer is awesome. Its much more space saving then my previous one and steams the food quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Isishannaisi

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts are not the best material for this steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer but I did not give it 5 stars because the plastic base that sits between the water and your food basket had a crack in it and now it just flops around. I need to find some glue to fix it! But I do love this steamer just wish it was made with sturdier material.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Frye

customer_reviews.title: It's me and not the product
customer_reviews.text: Please don't read to much into this review. The product is not what I expected. It's to small. It reminds me of the Easy Bake Oven my sister had as a child. I won't use it. Since I am the person who ordered it, I won't return it either. I'll make it a gift to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product - Don't deal with the hassle of an inevitable return
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE: this arrived broken. I washed the product then loaded by food into it to steam and after one minute it kept saying low water. I did't fill it up to the max line so I figured I would try that. Still didn't work. It didn't even steam the food. The sensor was clearly broken and once the "Low" water sign lights up it stops the timer and stop steaming. Threw away the box and I'm certainly not going to pay more money to package it and return it. DO NOT BUY WASTER OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Neda

customer_reviews.title: leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is just poorly designed. The water droplets drip out from the top lid, and run down the side of the unit, then onto the counter. I am sure some of it is seeping into the unit at the bottom of the base, which is likely an eventual fire hazard. I used this steamer 2 times, thinking maybe I set it up incorrectly the first time, but it dripped down the sides both times, so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Keough

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful & Healthy Food!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! I purchased this product after seeing a friend of mine steaming multiple vegetables in hers. It has exceeded my expectations! We have steemed everything from okra to potatoes and everything has tasted wonderful! I will be trying out seafood and peppers next week. This is a necessity in the kitchen if you enjoy healthy cooking with amazing flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t like to work as it gets moisturize and then acts as if it is out of water when in fact it’s full.
customer_reviews.author: JLooneyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good Steamer
customer_reviews.text: My steamer arrived with a dent in the side.I kept it hoping it will be fine.I bought this for our motorhome . My husband bought me one for Christmas a few years ago and I love it.Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok.. Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Works great, however after a few months use, the main steam container cracked. Luckily it's a stackable and I now use the larger plastic steamer container. There is no alarm or "DING" to let you know it's done (something I had to get used to) it automatically goes to warm and continues cooking veggies, if you like your veggies steamed but crisp, keep an eye on it. I use this steamer daily. It works fine , I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like it and use it almost everyday, save time for me. however I choose to give four stars because it leaks water sometime, I couldn't figure out why.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good, versitale.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a year ago. Use it for corn on the cob, broccoli, asparagus, crab legs, green beans and rice, white, brown and wild. Maybe other things too I don't remember. Do remember trying spinach, not so good. Use it sometimes 3-4 times a week. Works very well. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: product has a large det
customer_reviews.text: I love the steamer, but it arrived with a big dent in the side. The dent couldn't have been from shipping - it was well protected. It looks as if it was a returned product resold.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R. Even

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Digital Steamer - 5.5 Quart (37530A)
customer_reviews.text: Best Steamer ever I had, excellent quality, heavy duty, reliable,easy-to-use made forever Brilliant idea. BE CAREFUL HOW TO PUT THE STEAM CONTAINERS TOP OF EACH OTHERS. IF YOU DON'T FOLLOW THE NUMBERS (ON THE CONTAINER) ALL STEAM WATER GOES ON THE TABLE. You'll be surprised: WTF is this leaking??? NOOO you put the containers in the wrong way. I did it water was everywhere I would definitely recommend to a friend without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Laczko Studio

customer_reviews.title: Shows wear after a year's use
customer_reviews.text: I use this device several times a week. After a year+ usage, the plastic covering on the "on/off" push button is cracking and the the lid cracked. I wish it were more durable. On the positive side, I like the 'warm' feature that kicks in after the cooking is done and the precision of a digital timer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Really a nice easy way to make healthier meals
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice easy way to make healthier meals. Steamed salmon, chicken etc. In one basket and 15 minutes later add veggies in a second basket and you are done. Nice moist protein. I have bought others as gifts. I personally like to make red potatoes with carrots and broccoli.
customer_reviews.author: Anne the brave

customer_reviews.title: Returned product
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a Secret Santa gift for my person who never showed up to the Christmas party back in 2018. What a bummer. Looks like a nice product though....
customer_reviews.author: K A

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Steamer
customer_reviews.text: We love it. The steamer works well and both levels steam vegetables well. Its easy to clean but be careful after use because the water in the bottom stays hot for a period of time after you finish steaming. Also, it is easy to clean after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 37530A Digital Food Steamer, 5.5 Quart, Silver & Black
product_meta.description: Make mealtime more exciting and nutritious with the Hamilton Beach Digital Steamer. Place the transparent bowls of your choice of vegetables, seafood, or chicken atop the base and set the cooking timer. When done, the steamer beeps and switches to warm.
feature_bullets: Versatile, stackable 2-tier steaming,Nested storage - fits neatly in cabinet
Use 1 tier for small quantities, stack 2 tiers for a whole meal, or remove the center divider to fit a variety of large foods
Automatic warm - switches to warm when food is ready
Digital touchpad - makes setting the countdown timer and other functions easy
The food containers are to be hand-washed in soapy water, not to clean in Dishwasher Only the Drip Tray and Rice Bowl are Dishwasher safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,989 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
